column4: Can someone help me with ndiswrapper? I'm getting there. I have the wireless card installed and it's listed as a network interface.
But it doesn't exactly work as a network interface.
how does it 'work' and how does it 'not work' ? :P
it works by the fact that it is now listed as a network interface. It doesn't work in the fact that it doesn't actually do anything, except sit there and look cool.
It's builtin. That's why it looks cool.
have you configured it in the network interface?
It's been given an SSID and set to use DHCP
and the little checkmark saying "Device is configured" has been checked.
This isn't my router, so I'm not going to fuck around with static IPs and such.
sudo ifdown wlan0 (or whatever) and sudo ifup wlan0..
